messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] SHUT UP!! and eating at the computer
messages.msgSnippet: ... Count me in on this one! Stephanie E.
messages.messageBody:
> Ah ha! Finally someone who, like me, eats in front of the
> computer, often
> while reading here!
> I've been known to eat breakfast, lunch and dinner while
> reading at the
> computer depending on if I'm eating alone and if my dh is
> home, in which
> case I defnitely eat with him.
> Anyone else do this?

Count me in on this one!

Stephanie E.

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] SHUT UP!! and eating at the computer
messages.msgSnippet: Do you guys remember when I had to get a new keyboard?  member--no-space-bar. Guess why,  coffee on the keyboard,  oops.  Kelli ... Yes, all the time,
messages.messageBody:
Do you guys remember when I had to get a new keyboard? member--no-space-bar.

Guess why, coffee on the keyboard, oops. <g>

Kelli


marji <marji@...> wrote:At 17:59 1/27/03 -0700, you wrote:
>Ah ha! Finally someone who, like me, eats in front of the computer, often
>while reading here! I've been known to eat breakfast, lunch and dinner
>while reading at the computer depending on if I'm eating alone and if my
>dh is home, in which
>case I defnitely eat with him.
>Anyone else do this?
>
>Karin

Yes, all the time, because it's where I work and sometimes I gotta work
thru meals if I'm going to be available to Liam other times. So, here I
sit scarfing down my meals. I'm glad that other folks do it too.

Marji

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] SHUT UP!! and eating at the computer
messages.msgSnippet: ... someone ... Ah ha! Finally someone who, like me, eats in front of the computer, often while reading here! I ve been known to eat breakfast, lunch and
messages.messageBody:
amycats2@... wrote:

> In a message dated 1/27/2003 4:18:29 PM Eastern Standard Time,
> SandraDodd@... writes:
>
>
> > ("I wish that
> > dumbass prick would shut the fuck up")
>
> OK, I just choked on my dinner laughing. I guess I can just picture
someone
> saying it.


Ah ha! Finally someone who, like me, eats in front of the computer, often
while reading here!
I've been known to eat breakfast, lunch and dinner while reading at the
computer depending on if I'm eating alone and if my dh is home, in which
case I defnitely eat with him.
Anyone else do this?

Karin

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] SHUT UP!! and eating at the computer
messages.msgSnippet: ... I always eat breakfast while reading emails, sometimes lunch too. Which is why my keyboard is so icky. I figure that the kids don t bug me while I m eating
messages.messageBody:
Karin wrote:

> amycats2@... wrote:
>
> > In a message dated 1/27/2003 4:18:29 PM Eastern Standard Time,
> > SandraDodd@... writes:
> >
> >
> > > ("I wish that
> > > dumbass prick would shut the fuck up")
> >
> > OK, I just choked on my dinner laughing. I guess I can just picture
> someone
> > saying it.
>
> Ah ha! Finally someone who, like me, eats in front of the computer, often
> while reading here!
> I've been known to eat breakfast, lunch and dinner while reading at the
> computer depending on if I'm eating alone and if my dh is home, in which
> case I defnitely eat with him.
> Anyone else do this?
>
> Karin
>

I always eat breakfast while reading emails, sometimes lunch too. Which is why my keyboard is so icky. I figure that the kids don't bug me while I'm eating so instead of neglecting them after meals
while I read email and can neglect them doubly by eating and reading emails.
Right now is snack time. I've just done 10 miles on the exercise bike so I'm snacking on bread sticks n humus. Gotta make up them calories I just lost!!!

Shyrley
